jrtr
Class GLRenderPanel.GLRenderContextEventListener

java.lang.Object
  jrtr.GLRenderPanel.GLRenderContextEventListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, javax.media.opengl.GLEventListener
Enclosing class:
GLRenderPanel
private class GLRenderPanel.GLRenderContextEventListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.media.opengl.GLEventListener

An event listener for the GLJPanel to which this context renders. The main purpose of this event listener is to redirect display events to the renderer (the GLRenderContext).

public void init(javax.media.opengl.GLAutoDrawable drawable)
Initialization call-back. Makes a render context (a renderer) using the provided GLAutoDrawable and calls the user provided init of the render panel.
